name: AJAI RAGHU
company_address: VI/32F, Kaniyampuzha Road,, EROOR, COCHIN, KERALA, 682306
my_business: I represent Saga - The Craft People, an Interior Designing and contracting firm well experienced in conceptualizing and execution of Interior projects including home furnishing, office furnishing, commercial space designing and furnishing like boutiques, showrooms etc. We operate all over kerala and based at Eroor, where we have our office cum full fledged factory for panel processing with well trained professionals for designing and supervising and skilled work force for factory works and fitting.  for various interior products like modular kitchen, wardrobes, TV units and other related product. We also undertake interior job works like hot pressing, cutting, edge banding and fitting etc  for other interior contractors who don't have such facility. We do all kind of interior furnishing process from painting, flooring to soft furniture. Basically our job is to convert a shell space to a fully furnished space for living, office showrooms etc.
top_product: Modular kitchen and Wardrobes, interior Job works which includes hotpressing, cutting, edgebanding, multy boring etc.
ideal_referral: Any one who constructs his own home is an ideal referral. An architect, a contractor, a builder, owner of a commercial space, a new entrepreneur, a start up are all ideal referrals.
my_favourite_bni_story: conceptualized and completed exhibition space which include a modular kitchen and wardrobe in just 36 hours for Salvinz hard wares for Interior Exterior Exhibition.

name: JOHN P JAMES
company_address: 3/444A1 KD PLOT PO,, SOUTH KALAMASSERRY,, COCHIN, KERALA, 683104
my_business: At Satirth , we understand the importance of a powerful presence in today's competitive business landscape. We are a team of experienced professionals dedicated to helping business owners like you devise effective marketing strategies to maximize your visibility , attract your target audience, and drive business growth.
top_product: Digital Marketing Strategy: Creating a customized digital marketing strategy encompassing various channels such as social media, email marketing, search engine optimization (SEO), and content marketing to increase brand visibility and drive customer engagement. Content Creation: Developing high-quality content assets such as blog posts, articles, videos, infographics, and podcasts to educate, entertain, and engage your client's target audience. Analytics and Reporting: Providing regular performance analytics and insightful reports to track the effectiveness of marketing efforts, measure key metrics, and make data-driven decisions for continuous improvement.
ideal_referral: Small to Medium Business Owners: Individuals who own or manage small to medium-sized businesses in various industries. Entrepreneurs and Startups: Aspiring entrepreneurs or startup founders looking to establish their brand and grow their business. Marketing Decision Makers: Marketing managers or decision-makers within companies who are seeking to improve their brand's visibility, reach, and engagement.
top_problem_solved: Problem: Inconsistent Brand Presence Brand Identity Development: Satirth Business Solutions works closely with clients to develop a strong and cohesive brand identity that accurately reflects their values, mission, and unique selling propositions. Integrated Marketing Strategies: Our team develops integrated marketing strategies that align with the client's brand identity and objectives, ensuring consistency in messaging and visual representation across all channels.
my_favourite_bni_story: One of the most rewarding experiences I've had in BNI was with a fellow member who initially had reservations about leveraging social media or Google for lead generation. Recognizing the untapped potential in showcasing his success stories, I collaborated with him to develop a content marketing strategy. We highlighted his achievements and project updates across various social media platforms, effectively engaging his target audience. The results were remarkable. Within a short period, his online presence started to gain traction, leading to a significant increase in inquiries and business opportunities. Witnessing the transformation from skepticism to success was incredibly fulfilling. This experience underscored the power of tailored strategies and the importance of adapting to modern marketing methods. It's a testament to the immense value of creativity and collaboration within our BNI network.
